meanings.sent1: The puppy woofs happily when playing with its toy.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor's dog always woofs loudly when someone passes by.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but smile when I heard the little dog woof at the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The woof of the dog echoed through the quiet night, breaking the silence.
meanings.sent5: The sudden woof of the dog startled the birds nearby.

meanings.definition: The threads running lengthwise in a woven fabric
meanings.sent1: The weaver carefully inspected the woofs of the fabric for any imperfections.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the woofs in this textile determines its strength and durability.
meanings.sent3: She admired the intricate patterns created by the colorful woofs in the cloth.
meanings.sent4: The woofs of the fabric were tightly woven together, creating a smooth texture.
meanings.sent5: The skilled artisan focused on aligning the woofs perfectly to create a flawless design.
